name: Oakley the Snowman Demo 2
description:
• Move with A & D Keys
  • Jump with Spacebar
  • Shoot with Up Arrow Key
  • Mute BGM with M Key
  • Quit with Esc Key

Play as Oakley, a snowman out to right the wrongs of snow-throwing bullies, put out fires that melt him, and calm angry gnomes with snowballs.

This is the second Demo with Coins and Hearts added, as well as an update to the HUD.
